subject: Convert Revenue Model Calculator to dark theme
body:
- Updated body background to gray-900
- Changed all card backgrounds from white to gray-800 with gray-700 borders
- Updated all text colors (headings to gray-100, descriptions to gray-400)
- Converted form inputs and selects to dark theme with gray-700 backgrounds
- Updated all ApexCharts configurations with dark theme colors:
  - Transparent chart backgrounds
  - Gray-400 text for labels and axes
  - Gray-700 borders for grids
  - Dark tooltips
- Updated metrics panel with semi-transparent dark backgrounds and colored borders
- Maintained all functionality while improving visual appeal in dark mode
